price: আৰু যিসকলে নিজ প্ৰতিপালকৰ শাস্তি সম্পৰ্কে ভীত-সন্ত্ৰস্ত--
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
